comment.author: 9996782@N04
comment._content: I just love this style of houses. Like this ones: farm4.staticflickr.com/3652/3341207035_bbfefaebd4_o.jpg farm4.staticflickr.com/3438/3362812852_31ab2d35d1_o.jpg farm4.staticflickr.com/3311/3649379919_418f2e8685_o.jpg Maybe you are going to have them in one folder. They are very beautiful.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: farkas_csaba: It's called Old Norse style - very popular in Scandinavia especially during the 19th century. I found another photo of the Norwegian building in Dovre, on the website Telemark Heritage & Genealogy: heritagetelemark.no/eng/images/other_old_pictures_from_no... We are so glad you enjoy our photos! :) /Anna B.
